title: Has the 10-Year Gifts began distribution? Randomly got a Kayle champ from Riot?

embed.description: When we started this journey 10 years ago, we had no idea what Riot and League would become. Luckily, we were carried forward by the passion of a player community that continues to grow and evolve, ten years later. There's nothing more to say beyond thank you.

body: It's not that I'm ungrateful, it's more like I'm confused. After one of the my games today, I randomly got a gift of a Kayle champion from Riot. I remember reading about the 10-Year Gifts a few days ago, but I thought they weren't supposed to be distributed until later? Just trying to figure out where the Champ gift came from! If anyone is in the situation or knows what's going on, please let me know lol.

replies.body:
*Zombiemaster* is correct. Since there are millions of players who are getting these gifts, we have to distribute it in a specific way in an effort to get it out correctly. It would be pretty awkward to get gifted Riot Kayle without owning Kayle first.

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
Thanks for responding! I'll just sit tight and wait for everything to show up! Have a nice day :)

Yes, the distribution of the gifts has already begun, and it will continue one through the 23rd. They are gifting Kayle to anyone who doesn't own the champion first, and then they will begin gifting Riot Kayle.

Quick question!!!! To those of us who already owned Kayle and Riot Kayle. Will we be notified when we receive our mystery skin/or RP? I already got the summ icon but have not got my skin. Just wondering and making sure that I was not forgotten. Thanks!
